Text.Page:
Yeah, I know. It's the same old story. "Return to the safety of the camp." I don't think so.

Anyway, ready to help?"I don't remember volunteering."

I volunteered you. I'm researching the civilization of the giants, but I can't find enough historical documents to get a full understanding it. However, the {@LinkCreature:18#17#ancient teraliths} are covered with inscriptions. I wonder if they'd help.

If you'd collect some for me, I'd be grateful.

Oh, look at these inscriptions! They're exactly what I'd hoped.

These pictures will teach me a lot. Good work!

Here, take this for your trouble. I know it's not much, but it's all I can get this far from camp.

If you're looking for the {@LinkCreature:18#17#ancient teraliths} around here, you're going to be looking for a long time.

Go on, now. Are you in or out?
